citrus.aphids: Apply insecticidal soap weekly until populations decline.
citrus.scale: Use horticultural oil spray at bud break.

tomato.blight: Apply copper-based fungicide at first sign.

lettuce.aphids: Apply pyrethrin spray if infestations persist.
lettuce.leafminers: Use sticky traps and remove affected leaves.

strawberry.spider mites: Apply miticide when mites exceed threshold.
strawberry.slugs: Use bait or barriers to protect plants.

spinach.aphids: Blast with water and apply insecticidal soap.
spinach.leaf miners: Use row covers and remove damaged leaves.

basil.aphids: Use insecticidal soap for severe infestations.
basil.leaf miners: Remove affected leaves and apply neem oil.
